name: Armello - Bringing Tabletop Adventures to Life
blurb: A digital card and board game of heroes and high-adventure set in the fairy-tale animal kingdom of Armello!

rewards.reward:
ARMELLIAN [Digital Tier]
============================== 
THE GAME + IN-GAME DICE + DOWNLOADABLE WALLPAPERS + FORUM ACCESS
==============================
One Digital Copy of Armello (PC/Mac/Linux) 
+ In-Game Special Dice (Exclusive to Backers) 
+ Downloadable Wallpapers + Access to the 'backer only' Forums + 'Armellian' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Armellians' section of Armello's credits. 
*********************************************

LISTENER [Digital Tier]
==============================
SOUNDTRACK + IN-GAME ITEM: LISTENER AMULET
==============================
Downloadable Digital Soundtrack by Michael Allen & Lisa Gerrard + In-Game Item: 'Listener' Amulet adds a new and unique perk to your Heroes (Exclusive to Backers) + 'Listener' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Listeners' section of Armello's credits. 
*********************************************
Includes rewards from previous tiers.

SCRIBE+ (NEW!)[Digital Tier] ============================== ART BOOK + NOVELLAS + BETA ACCESS + AUDIO BOOKS ============================== Downloadable Art Book + Set of Armello Novellas featuring some illustrations (PDF/EPUB) + Access to the Beta (via Steam) + NEW AUDIO BOOKS + 'Scribe' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Scribes' section of Armello's credits. ********************************************* Includes rewards from previous tiers and replaces SCRIBE original tier

SCRIBE [Digital Tier]
==============================
ART BOOK + NOVELLAS + BETA ACCESS
==============================
Downloadable Art Book + Set of Armello Novellas featuring some illustrations (PDF/EPUB) + Access to the Beta (via Steam) + 'Scribe' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Scribes' section of Armello's credits. 
*********************************************
Includes rewards from previous tiers.

BANDIT [Digital Tier] (Early Bird)
============================== 
BACKER 'BANDIT CLAN' & HEROES!
==============================
Get in fast to get access to our BANDIT (Digital Tier) at this early bird price. Details below! 
*********************************************
Includes rewards from previous tiers.

BANDIT [Digital Tier]
============================== 
BACKER 'BANDIT CLAN' & HEROES!
==============================
Be the envy of all your friends and foes! Gain access to the exclusive 'backer only' Bandit Clan! Includes four unique heroes, four powerful clan signet rings and the special Bandit clan dice + 'Bandit' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Bandits' section of Armello's credits. 
*********************************************
Includes rewards from previous tiers.

I <3 GUPPY! (Early Bird) ============================== GET THE GUPPY PLUSHY!  ==============================  Get the 'I <3 GUPPY!' (Physical Tier) at this early bird price. Details below! ********************************************* Includes rewards from previous tiers. *********************************************\r\nAdd $10 for Shipping outside of the US.

I <3 GUPPY! ==============================
GET THE GUPPY PLUSHY!
==============================
Recruit Guppy to your side with this awesome 10-15" soft toy of everybody's favourite unlucky squire (as seen in Armello 'Horrors and Heroes') + 'Guppyguard' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Guppyguards' section of Armello's credits. 
********************************************* 
Includes rewards from all previous tiers.
********************************************* 
Add $10 for Shipping outside of the US.

ARTISAN 
==============================
ARMELLO ART TOME!
==============================
Receive your very own Hardcover Art Book of Armello. 50+ Pages, featuring concept and final art from the game, novella illustrations and trailer productions + 'Artisan' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Artisans' section of Armello's credits. 
*********************************************
Includes rewards from previous tiers.
********************************************* Add $10 for shipping outside of the US.

GAMER 
==============================
ALPHA ACCESS + ARMELLO DICE & BAG
==============================
For the true gamers, get the same Chessex dice that we had custom made for our paper prototype. Includes five dice, a booklet with a combat tutorial, mini-games and challenges to prepare you for your quest for the throne! All in a felt dice bag + Early Access to the game's ALPHA build (via Steam) + 'Gamer' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Gamers' section of Armello's credits. 
*********************************************
Includes rewards from previous tiers.
********************************************* Add $10 for shipping outside of the US.

GAMER+ (NEW!) ============================== ALPHA ACCESS + ARMELLO COINS, DICE & BAG + DIGITAL SELF PRINT POSTER ============================== For the true gamers, get the same Chessex dice that we had custom made for our paper prototype. Includes five dice, a booklet with a combat tutorial, mini-games and challenges to prepare you for your quest for the throne! All in a felt dice bag + Early Access to the game's ALPHA build (via Steam) + 'Gamer' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Gamers' section of Armello's credits. AND Metal Cast Armello Coins just like those in the trailer PLUS a DIGITAL Self-Print Poster. ********************************************* Includes rewards from previous tiers and replaces GAMER original tier. ********************************************* Add $10 for shipping outside of the US.

GUARDIAN 
==============================
LIMITED EDITION ARMELLO SOUNDTRACK
==============================
The limited edition (NO MORE WILL EVER BE PRINTED), numbered, Armello Original Soundtrack composed by Michael Allen & Lisa Gerrard. Includes bonus, unreleased tracks! + 'Guardian' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Guardians' section of Armello's credits. 
*********************************************
Includes rewards from previous tiers.
********************************************* Add $10 for shipping outside of the US.

HERO 
==============================
ARMELLO MINIATURE
==============================
Armello miniature of your favourite Hero. An approximate 6", high quality collectible miniature + 'Hero' forum & In-Game badge + Your name in the 'Heroes' section of Armello's credits. 
==============================
Add $50 for each additional figurine.
*********************************************
Includes rewards from previous tiers.
********************************************* Add $10 for shipping outside of the US.
